title: GPU Compute Performance Engineer
summary: The Apple Silicon GPU Driver Performance team is responsible for ensuring great GPU performance across our entire product line. Members of this team possess deep technical expertise in GPU architecture and programming models.
description: The team is seeking extraordinary GPU and machine learning engineers who are passionate about providing robust compute solutions for accelerating machine learning workloads on Apple Silicon. Responsibilities include working with internal partners to analyze and improve GPU and system performance, optimizing GPU based ML algorithm implementations, defining hardware roadmap, and developing tools for performance analysis on Apple Silicon GPUs.
key_qualifications: Experience or interest in emerging GPGPU use cases, optimizing compute workloads for GPU performance, GPU programming with Metal, DirectX, Vulkan, CUDA, Direct Compute, OpenGL, or OpenCL, excellent software design and problem solving skills, system debugging skills, written and oral communication skills.
preferred_qualifications: Experience in ML frameworks such as pytorch, tensorflow, JAX and similar, GPU compute kernel optimization experience for ML training and inference operations.
